          <title>
            <string language="en">Mass of ice cube and mass of melted ice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse des Eiswürfels und Masse des geschmolzenen
Eises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La masse du cube en glace et la masse de la glace
fondue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Massa do cubo do gelo e massa do gelo derretido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Massa di cubo del ghiaccio e massa di ghiaccio 
fuso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάζα του κύβου πάγου και μάζα του λειωμένου πάγου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Masa del cubo del hielo y masa del hielo 
derretido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the mass of ice cube doesn't change after melting.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">weighing</string>

          <keyword>

          <structure>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Masse des 
Eiswürfels nicht ändert, nachdem sie geschmolzen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la masse du cube en
glace ne change pas après fonte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a massa do cubo do 
gelo não muda após o derretimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la massa di cubo 
del ghiaccio non cambia dopo la fusione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η μάζα του κύβου 
πάγου δεν αλλάζει μετά από να λειώσει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la masa del cubo 
del hielo no cambia después de derretir.</string>
          </description>
